More Utilities

Some utilities have been moved from Boost.Utilities to more appropriate Boost libraries:

  1. Moved to Boost.Core
    1. addressof
    2. checked_delete
    3. enable_if
    4. noncopyable
  2. Moved to Boost.TypeTraits
    1. declval
  3. Moved to Boost.Iterator
    1. generator iterator adaptors
    2. next/prior
  4. Moved to Boost.IO
    1. ostream_string
  5. Moved to Boost.ThrowException
    1. throw_exception
